experience.title: Trainee Software Engineer
description: Improved code quality and accelerated development cycles by adopting Test-Driven Development (TDD) methodologies, contributing to more reliable and efficient deployments.
Built full-stack applications with React.js for dynamic frontends and SpringBoot, Flask, Django for robust backends, demonstrating versatility in handling diverse technology stacks.
Developed RESTful APIs to enhance scalability and data exchange efficiency, crucial for microservices architecture and seamless integration with other systems.
Designed responsive UIs using React, Tailwind CSS, and Figma, ensuring optimal user experience across various devices and platforms.
Implemented automated testing pipelines using GitHub Actions to ensure code quality and facilitate continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD).

experience.title: Project Head (EDUNE$T) – Student Loan Application System
description: Developed a full-stack application for student loan application, including verification and admin approval features, showcasing end-to-end software development capabilities.
Integrated document validation, user role authorization, and external school API, demonstrating experience in integrating with external services and managing complex system interactions.
Secure JWT-based authentication and role access control, ensuring application security and data protection.
Implemented infrastructure-as-code principles for consistent environment provisioning and deployments.

projects.title: Electronic Medical Record with colleagues
projects.description: Developed a decentralized medical record using Sui blockchain technology, showcasing experience with blockchain technologies and collaborative development.

projects.title: Edunest(Student Loan App)
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce application that is based selling electronic materials, demonstrating skills in building complete application systems.

projects.title: E-commerceMarketPlace
projects.description: Developed and built an E-commerce application for clothing and accessories, showcasing practical experience in developing consumer-facing applications.

projects.title: Contact Management System App
projects.description: Contact management application, demonstrating ability to design and implement efficient database-driven applications.
